Player History
Signed as a free agent by New York (Y) on 2/24/1986 to a 2-year deal worth $510,000 per year...
Injured on 6/19/1990 with a Pulled Abdominal Muscle, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 7/18/1990, off Tom Glavine (DET)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/5/1991, off Dana Kiecker (BOS)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/9/1991, off Rich Monteleone (TEX)...
Was selected to the 1992 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/14/1992, hitting .458 with 1 HR, 7 RBI...
